name: rxdb
description: A realtime Database for JavaScript applications
// version: For pre-release versions run 'npm publish --tag next'
author: pubkey

scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.// test:fast: run tests in the fast-mode. Most of them will run in parrallel, skips tests that are known slow
scripts.test:fast: npm run test:fast:pouchdb && npm run test:fast:lokijs && npm run test:fast:lokijs-worker
scripts.test:fast:pouchdb: npm run pretest && rimraf -rf pouch__all_dbs__ && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=pouchdb NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:fast:lokijs: npm run pretest && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=lokijs NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:fast:dexie: npm run pretest && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:fast:lokijs-worker: npm run pretest && rimraf -rf pouch__all_dbs__ && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=lokijs-worker NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.// test:fast:loop: runs tests in the fast-mode in a loop. Use this to debug tests that only fail sometimes
scripts.test:fast:loop: npm run test:fast && npm run test:fast:loop
scripts.test:fast:loop:lokijs: npm run test:fast:lokijs && npm run test:fast:loop:lokijs
scripts.test:node: npm run test:node:pouchdb && npm run test:node:lokijs && npm run test:node:lokijs-worker
scripts.test:node:pouchdb: npm run pretest && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=pouchdb mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:lokijs: npm run pretest && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=lokijs mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:lokijs-worker: npm run pretest && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=lokijs-worker mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:dexie: npm run pretest && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:pouchdb:loop: npm run test:node:pouchdb && npm run test:node:pouchdb:loop
scripts.test:node:lokijs:loop: npm run test:node:lokijs && npm run test:node:lokijs:loop
scripts.// test:node:loop: runs tests in node in a loop. Use this to debug tests that only fail sometimes
scripts.test:node:loop: npm run test:node && npm run test:node:loop
scripts.test:browser: npm run pretest && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=pouchdb karma start ./config/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test:typings: npm run pretest && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=pouchdb NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/typings.test.js
scripts.test:deps: npm run build && dependency-check ./package.json ./dist/lib/plugins/replication-graphql/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/server.js ./dist/lib/plugins/validate-z-schema.js ./dist/lib/plugins/lokijs/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/dexie/index.js ./dist/lib/plugins/worker/index.js --no-dev --ignore-module util --ignore-module babel-plugin-transform-async-to-promises --ignore-module url --ignore-module as-typed --ignore-module "@types/*"
scripts.test:performance:pouchdb: npm run pretest && cross-env STORAGE=pouchdb mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc
scripts.test:performance:lokijs: npm run pretest && cross-env STORAGE=lokijs mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc
scripts.test:performance:lokijs-worker: npm run pretest && cross-env STORAGE=lokijs-worker mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc
scripts.test:couchdb: npm run pretest && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=pouchdb mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/couch-db-integration.test.js
scripts.profile: npm run pretest && rm -f isolate-* && cross-env STORAGE=pouchdb NODE_ENV=fast NODE_PROF=true mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.js ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --v8-prof --expose-gc && node scripts/profile.js
scripts.build:es: rimraf -rf dist/es && cross-env NODE_ENV=es6 babel src --out-dir dist/es --source-maps --extensions ".ts,.js"
scripts.build: npm run clear && concurrently "npm run transpile" "npm run build:es" "npm run build:types" && browserify dist/lib/browserify.index.js > dist/rxdb.browserify.js && terser --compress --mangle --output dist/rxdb.browserify.min.js -- dist/rxdb.browserify.js
scripts.build:min: npm run transpile && browserify dist/lib/browserify.index.js > dist/rxdb.browserify.js && terser --compress --mangle --output dist/rxdb.browserify.min.js -- dist/rxdb.browserify.js
scripts.build:webpack: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=build webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js
scripts.// docs: TODO move away from gitbook so we are not forced to use node.js version 13 to build the docs
scripts.// docs:serve: start a local server to watch the docs. Served at http://localhost:4000/
scripts.docs:build: gitbook install docs-src && gitbook build docs-src docs && cp docs-src/files/logo/icon.png docs/gitbook/images/apple-touch-icon-precomposed-152.png && cp docs-src/files/logo/icon.ico docs/gitbook/images/favicon.ico && npm run docs:copy
scripts.docs:copy: cp -r docs-src/files docs/files && npm run docs:copy:landingpage
scripts.disc: npm run transpile && npm run build:es && cross-env NODE_ENV=disc webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.dev:example: watch 'npm run transpile:src && echo "done"' src/ test/
